name: Shadow (itch) (Superpig5246)
description:
Made in two weeks for Jam-o-lantern

Game by Nicholas Soares

Music by Ben Slattery

Controls: 

WASD/left stick - Move

Shift/right trigger - 2D to 3D

R/Select - Restart

Space/A - Jump

As is common knowledge, libraries are filled with demons that manifest themselves from the twisted words of authors that reside within a library's walls. These demons more or less keep to themselves, getting more than entertainment with the words that gave them life and generally living quietly inside of books. 

On the off chance that one such demon would need to venture out of their comfort zone, they would no doubt traverse only in the shadows, interacting with the physical world only to clear a path in the shadows. 

Now, on a particular day in one particular library one particularly new particular demon went and...uh...did his demon business all over the place, not realizing that there was a system in place for that kind of stuff. Incredibly embarrassed, the demon ventured out to collect his...belongings.
